title: Timers, Clocks and Counters Pack
description: A set of extremely versatile and functional Clocks, Timers and Counters. Drag in a pre-made Blueprint and adjust the settings to fit almost any project.
longDescription:
Preview Video: https://youtu.be/s8pbOH98kxs

Tutorial Video: https://youtu.be/zj9mMZqSaB4

**If you like this please check out my other Asset Packs:

Steampunk Prop Pack for Gears, Vacuum Tubes, Gauges, Spline pipes, a Compass and more.

Procedural Spline Walls System for versatile and easy to use Spline walls in various styles from Sci-fi to Old Stone and more.

Join our Discord!


Build your own props with the different modular parts, or add one of the pre-made Blueprint Actors to easily make the props fit nearly any type of project.

Various functional Blueprint actors include options to adjust the look of all items from "New" to "Old" and anywhere in between.

15 Blueprints including Clocks, LCD timers, Valve counters and more.

All Blueprints have appearance settings to customize the look to fit your project.

Material Instances are extremely versatile and allows you to adjust "Age", tint, roughness, metallic and much more.
technicalDetails:
Features:

15 User-friendly Blueprints with extensive customization options:

  1. Analogue wall clock that can display real or custom time
  2. LCD digital clock with customizable display color and brightness
  3. LCD timer that can trigger events when the timer runs out
  4. 3 digit LCD Counter that can count to a target number or display custom numbers
  5. 4 digit LCD Counter that can count to a target number or display custom numbers
  6. Pocket watch with animated front cover that can the opened and closed
  7. Valve display clock that can show custom or real time
  8. Inverted Valve display clock that can show custom or real time
  9. Valve timer that can trigger events when timer runs out
  10. Inverted Valve timer that can trigger events when timer runs out
  11. 3 digit Valve Counter that can count to a target number or display custom numbers
  12. Inverted 3 digit Valve Counter that can count to a target number or display custom numbers
  13. 4 digit Valve Counter that can count to a target number or display custom numbers
  14. Inverted 4 digit Valve Counter that can count to a target number or display custom numbers
  15. Single digit Valve display

Demo Map with a guided tour

Number of Meshes: 54

Texture Sizes:

4069x4096

2048x2048

1024x1024(Clock Faces use separate texture to allow simple customization.)

Collision: Yes, automatically generated

Vertex Count: 4-1510

LODs: 3 on more complex meshes - Generated then Optimized

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 21 Master Materials and Instances.

Number of Textures: 60, Includes Diffuse, Roughness, Opacity, Emissive and Normal Textures.

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, Linux.

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, Linux.

releaseInfo.releaseNote: Added BP_ValveDisplaySeparate that enables to user to use a single valve to create custom display layouts.
